casebody.data:
No. 248A18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Robert E. Fields, III, Attorney at Law, for Sykes, Susan, et al. Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, for Sykes, Susan, et al. William A. Blancato, GAL Appellate Attorney, for Sykes, Susan, et al. Leon E. Porter, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Sykes, Susan, et al. Ellis B. Drew, III, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Sykes, Susan, et al. Elizabeth L. Winters, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina. Chad D. Hansen, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina. D. Erik Albright, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cigna Healthcare of North Carolina, Inc. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Medcost LLC.

Jennifer K. Van Zant, Attorney at Law, Greensboro.

Benjamin R. Norman, Attorney at Law, Greensboro.

W. Michael Dowling, Attorney at Law.

Adam H. Charnes, Attorney at Law, for Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina. Joshua B. Simon, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Cigna Healthcare of North Carolina, Inc. Warren Haskel, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Cigna Healthcare of North Carolina, Inc. Dmitriy Tishyevich, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Cigna Healthcare of North Carolina, Inc. Peter M. Boyle, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina. Christina E. Fahmy, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina.

Susan SYKES d/b/a Advanced Chiropractic and Health Center, Dawn Patrick, Troy Lynn, Lifeworks on Lake Norman, PLLC, Brent Bost, and Bost Chiropractic Clinic, P.A.
v.
BLUE CROSS AND BLUE SHIELD OF NORTH CAROLINA, Cigna Healthcare of North Carolina, Inc., Medcost LLC, Healthgram, Inc.

*824AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 16th of July 2019 for rehearing of the decision of this Court pursuant to Rule 31, N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to Forsyth County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of September 2019."
